about_the_game:
Replicat is a roguelike deckbuilder that bends the rules of memory matching. Build powerful decks, break conventions with game-altering curios, and score high with wild strategies.

Matching cards is just the beginning. Stack game-breaking effects that twist the way you play.

Reveal extra cards, keep tiles flipped, match wild Jokers, and even force mismatched pairs to succeed.

While memory helps, strategy is king as your deck grows stronger and more unpredictable.

  • Match cards in ways you never thought possible.

  • Collect unique curios that rewrite the rules of the game.

  • Turn mistakes into opportunities with clever deckbuilding.

Experiment with different deck archetypes to forge powerful, rule-defying strategies.

Whether you focus on extra moves, passive reveals, turn manipulation, multipliers or pure chaos, every build offers a unique way to outwit the board.

🃏 5 card colors, each with distinct mechanics.

🔮 55+ unique cards, from memory-twisting effects to reality-breaking Jokers.

✨ 50+ curios that redefine how you match and strategize.

🧪 4 essence categories with 14 upgrade types to shape your run.

🔥 Face 21 levels of escalating challenge.

👑 Battle unique boss stages, each with its own game-changing modifiers.

📨 MORE TO COME!

No two runs are ever the same in Replicat. Every game is packed with randomized challenges, unique modifiers, and fresh opportunities to experiment with new strategies. As you play, earn experience to unlock:

  • New cards to expand your deck-building options

  • New starting decks for varied playstyles

  • Higher difficulties for even greater challenges

Immerse yourself in Replicat’s jazzy, funky world filled with adorable cat emotes, meowing sound effects, and vibrant visuals.

Whether you’re chasing high scores or crafting outrageous combos, Replicat keeps you coming back for more!
